material_care: FASTER BOILING - Powered by 1200 watts, the elctric kettle also boils water faster than conventional means. It has concealed heating elements made of pure copper that can boil 1 L of water EASY TO USE - The kettle comes with a mesh so you can use it to brew teas such as lemongrass or jasmine and pour them straight into your cup. It also has a detachable 360¬∞ rotating base and an easy to open, fill and close hinged lid with a release button. It also has a 1.2 m long wire TOP-NOTCH SAFETY FEATURES - The electric kettle has dry-boil protection which means it won't switch on if there is no water inside. It also has an auto cut-off so the appliance will switch off on its own once the water has finished boiling. The stay-cool handles will not heat up while the water is boiling EASY TO CLEAN - The wide mouth and detachable base and hidden heating components make it esy to clean the electric kettle

material_care: MULTIFUNCTIONAL: The SOLARA 600W Multipurpose Electric Kettle is the ultimate electric kettle multipurpose solution for modern kitchens. Designed to steam and boil at the same time, it allows you to prepare a variety of meals quickly and conveniently. From instant noodles, soups, eggs, and pasta to oatmeal, this multipurpose electric kettle provides endless meal options. It also comes with an egg boiler tray for effortless egg boiling, making breakfast preparation fast and simple. PREMIUM QUALITY: Crafted with high-quality stainless steel, this electric multipurpose kettle ensures durability, rust resistance, and long-lasting performance. Unlike regular kettles, this one is built to handle multiple cooking tasks without compromising safety or efficiency. COMPACT & PORTABLE: With a 1.5L capacity, this water kettle electric is lightweight, easy to carry, and compact enough for small spaces. Whether you‚Äôre living in a dorm room, apartment, or working in an office, this multi cooker electric kettle is perfect for quick meals. It‚Äôs also an excellent choice for travelers and campers who need a portable cooking solution. SAFETY FEATURES: Safety is a priority with the SOLARA Multipurpose Electric Kettle. It includes an indicator light, boil-dry protection, and overheat prevention to keep your cooking experience safe. The cool-touch handle ensures you can handle the kettle without the risk of burns, even during high-temperature use. EASY TO CLEAN: Maintaining your electric multipurpose kettle is simple. Use white vinegar, baking soda, and water, along with a soft cleaning cloth, to keep your kettle looking new and functioning efficiently. VERSATILE USE: More than just a kettle, this appliance doubles as a multi cooker electric kettle and a milk boiler electric. It‚Äôs perfect for making tea, coffee, soups, boiling milk, and more, making it a truly electric kettle multipurpose appliance for every household. WARRANTY: Enjoy peace of mind with a 1-year warranty, ensuring a worry-free purchase and reliable performance for the long term.

material_care: Milton Riga Electric 1.5 Stainless Steel Electric Kettle come with Double Walled & Auto Cut-off for long lasting used. Detachable 360 Degree Connector with Cool touch body and cordless pot. Sturdy handle lets you touch it immediately after it stops functioning without having to worry about burning your hands. Wide mouth for easy cleaning, Hinded Lid for convenience. Supply: 230 Votls AC, 50 Hz., Power: 1500 Watts. Heating efficiency: Electric kettles are designed to heat water faster than traditional stovetop kettles. They typically use a high-wattage heating element that rapidly boils water, saving you time and energy. Convenience: With an electric kettle, you can easily and quickly boil water for various purposes, such as making hot beverages like tea, coffee, or hot chocolate, preparing instant soups or noodles, or even sterilizing baby bottles. Temperature control: Many electric kettles come with temperature control settings, allowing you to choose the desired temperature for different beverages. For example, you can select lower temperatures for delicate teas or higher temperatures for boiling water. Automatic shut-off: Most modern electric kettles have built-in safety features like automatic shut-off. Once the water reaches its boiling point or the kettle becomes empty, the kettle will turn off automatically, preventing overheating or potential accidents.
